title: Companion Approval Guide
content: Shadowheart +Karlach + Lae'zel -Astarion -Wyll - Sentinel Olak Goblin Camp - The Goblin Guard post in front of the bridge. Throw Poo on multiple guards, not the Athletics Check throwing it does not provide approval Requirement/s: Requires to pass the Deceit or Nature Check for dialogue to pass. This is not the Athletics Check. This dialogue choice requires you to pick up the dog poo and throwing it to multiple guards Lae'zel +Astarion +Wyll +Karlach + None Sentinel Olak Goblin Camp - The Goblin
